summary: A Coat with unique metal plates and a distinctive appearance. You can be fashionable yet deadly wearing the Steel Dragon Longcoat.
descriptionHtml:
Craftable in the leather section. Fully enchanctable and temperable and a clean .esp. I know for sure because I was the only one working in there.

retexture was done by Jerros on my original Duelist longcoat
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34051 , so make sure you give some kudos to him.

If for some reason you want to check out the .esp it's SwordsmansCoat.esp . If you want to make this coat extremely powerful you can do that yourself (it's easy). If you can't get the creation kit then you probably didn't buy this game, and if so get off this site.

As for a female version I'm sorry lady's (perhaps gentleman) I am not going to do one. It is the last thing I want to spend my time doing and I've already moved onto something else. The only reason I put a bit of work on this is because of the beautiful re-texture.
author: str8maverick and Jerros
